==Trivia==
* {{Talent Note|clap}}
** Plunging Attacks cause them to flinch if Nahida is close enough during the entire Plunging Attack.
* The small platforms Nahida spawns during her normal attack resemble the keys of a {{w|mechanical keyboard}}.
* On the other hand, Nahida's Charged Attack resembles a {{w|Cursor (user interface)#Pointer|mouse pointer}} performing a drag-select.
